moves.1. e4: This one is my favorite game.
moves.8... Be6 9. Bxe6 Bxc3+ 10. bxc3 Qxe6: revenge for my mistake. But now I am down a rook.
moves.11. Nxh8 Ne7 12. O-O Nbc6 13. Re1 O-O-O: a pawn for a knight OK.
moves.16... Nd5 17. Qd3 Nf6: At this time I am trying to cut down some of his power pieces.
Time for a trade. I still have my favorite pieces knights.
moves.26. Qxa5 Nxa5 27. Rb5 Nac4 28. Bc1 Rd5 2: Now it is two knights vs. a rook and a bishop.
moves.29... Nxd5 30. Re8+ Kd7 31. Rh8 h5 32. R: At this time it is survival. And thoughts of resigning.
moves.37... Nd6 38. Bg5 Ndc8 39. Rh7 b6 40. c4: Now I am thinking of promoting a pawn.
moves.41... a5 42. Kc3 b5 43. cxb5 cxb5 44. Rg: Now down to business. I now think I can pull this off.
moves.46. Kb3 a4+ 47. Ka3 Ncb6 48. Rxg6+ Kf7 4: It is a matter of time now.
moves.50... b4 51. Rc6 b3+ 52. Ka1 b2+ 53. Kb1: After all said a done we both made major mistakes. But if my opponent have not stalled on some of his moves this would have been a loss for me.
